commands.name: screenshot
commands.description: Take a screenshot of the current screen.

commands.name: speak
commands.description: Speak a given text using TTS. Usage: /speak(text={"Hello world"})

commands.name: exit
commands.description: End the session and force the assistant to return to sleep mode (wake-word detection). Usage: /exit()

commands.name: wait
commands.description: Wait for a specified number of seconds before continuing. Usage: /wait(seconds={3})

commands.name: settings
commands.description: Modifies an existing setting in settings.json. Only existing settings can be changed; new settings cannot be added. Usage: /settings(key={"auto-conversation-end"})
